caption.p: Regional distribution of Covid-19 outbreak in Italy (from February 24 to April 27, 2020). A) abundance of Covid-19 cases (absolute number); B) percentage of positive subjects referred to the number of performed tests (oropharyngeal swabs); C) mortality rate on the number of positive cases; D) percentage of Covid-19 cases normalized to the number of inhabitants; E) percentage of deaths normalized to the number of inhabitants. Data obtained and re-elaborated from the official daily reports of Italian Civil Protection Department ( ICPD, 2020).
